article_title: Watch: “Star Wars” trilogy gets an awesome Marvel makeover
article_text:
Topics: cool culture, Disney, j.j. abrams, Marvel, Movies, Star Wars, Video, Innovation News, Entertainment News

YouTube allows users to reimagine different endings to beloved shows, create inventive compilations and put a spin on classic movies. And there’s no shortage of “Star Wars” reinventions: David Lynch and Quentin Tarantino-like styles have been applied to the original trilogy.

And now it has been given the inevitable modern twist: “Star Wars” revamped as Marvel’s “Guardians of the Galaxy.” The revamp comes from YouTube user The Usual Suspect, or Ross Fearnley, according to The Verge. Watch below:

And watch the “Guardians of the Galaxy” trailer below:

h/t The Verge
